data.eml:eml: A key to the Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) egg parasitoids of proconiine sharpshooters (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) in the Nearctic region, with description of two new species of Gonatocerus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Triapitsyn, Serguei V. (2006): A key to the Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) egg parasitoids of proconiine sharpshooters (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) in the Nearctic region, with description of two new species of Gonatocerus. Zootaxa 1203: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172335
